column3:
I think "getnetworkinfo" is a more appropriate place for this item to be exported.

ACK the rest.

@jgarzik Good idea - I didn't know we added getnetworkinfo.

Fixed.

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/38405ac1411ce73f6945f296980d559e2949027f for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
This wants a tiny BIP, IMO, noting the service bit experimental range.\n
Agreed. Though that BIP could be very short and simple. Basically just the contents of that comment.\n
Nit: please leave out the size specifier (ll) - tinyformat doesn't care about it.\n
